name: Apiary Investment Funds
overview: The Apiary Investment Fund is an investment fund that is managed through proprietary trading systems, technology and crowd sourced investing. With over 150 traders working from independent locations throughout the globe, the Apiary Investment Fund requires each trader to complete a comprehensive trader development program where they are trained and certified to manage different trading systems and platforms. Each trader works independently to generate profitable returns and is compensated based on their individual success and track record. The combined work of the community of traders works as an effective diversification model to reduce portfolio risk and generates consistent growth through the crowd sourced money management.
